oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Seventy-sixth annual report of the receipts and expenditures of the city of Concord for the fiscal year ending December 31, 1928, together with the other annual reports and papers relating to the affairs of the city.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Concord Town Representatives
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is an annual report containing vital statistics for a town/city in the state of New Hampshire.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: University of New Hampshire Scholars' Repository
